id: partition
---

<!-- Do not edit this file. It is generated automatically -->

## partition() function

Iterable/AsyncIterable을 두 개의 배열로 분할합니다: `f`를 만족하는 모든 요소를 포함하는 배열과 그렇지 않은 모든 요소를 포함하는 배열.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function partition<
  A,
  L extends A,
  R extends A = A extends object ? ExcludeObject<A, L> : Exclude<A, L>,
>(f: (a: A) => a is L, iterable: Iterable<A>): [L[], R[]];
```

## Example

```ts
partition((a) => a % 2 === 0, [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]); // [[2, 4], [1, 3, 5]]

// with pipe
pipe(
  [1, 2, 3, 4, 5],
  partition((a) => a % 2 === 0), // [[2, 4], [1, 3, 5]]
);

await pipe(
  Promise.resolve([1, 2, 3, 4, 5]),
  partition((a) => a % 2 === 0), // [[2, 4], [1, 3, 5]]
);

// if you want to use asynchronous callback
await pipe(
  Promise.resolve([1, 2, 3, 4, 5]),
  toAsync,
  partition(async (a) => a % 2 === 0), // [[2, 4], [1, 3, 5]]
);

// with toAsync
await pipe(
  [
    Promise.resolve(1),
    Promise.resolve(2),
    Promise.resolve(3),
    Promise.resolve(4),
    Promise.resolve(5),
  ],
  toAsync,
  partition((a) => a % 2 === 0), // [[2, 4], [1, 3, 5]]
);
```

[Try It](https://codesandbox.io/s/fxts-partition-7vns0)

see [pipe](https://fxts.dev/ko/api/pipe)<!-- -->, [toAsync](https://fxts.dev/ko/api/toAsync)

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/partition.ts)
